entry.tran: 沉着的;镇静的;泰然自若的
entry.def: Someone who is self-possessed is calm and confident and in control of their emotions.

example.ex: She is clearly the most articulate and self-possessed member of her family.
example.tran: 显然，她是全家口才最好、最沉着冷静的人。

baesInfo.translate_result: be possessed发疯，渴望做某事，镇静
baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
